summary: A scientist creates a fully grown test tube baby from the cells of a mathematician, and the two are frequently mistaken for each other by gangsters, private investigators, the police, and the baby's creator himself.
cast: Spede Pasanen|Vesa-Matti Loiri|Simo Salminen|Tapio Hämäläinen|Olavi Ahonen|Helge Herala|Seppo Laine|Pehr-Olof Sirén|Yrjö Tähtelä|Esa Pakarinen Jr.|Rita Polster|Kirsti Wallasvaara|Ritva Vepsä|Merja Tammi|Tuire Pentikäinen|Anja Pohjola|Tarmo Jokinen|Martti Kakko|Pekka Lampela
title: Koeputkiaikuinen ja Simon enkelit
